Name: Erlinda
description:
Erlinda has been engaged in the basket weaving business for fifteen years; it is a lucrative venture in their area. She is a widow and has three grown children.

She wants to improve the sales and profits flow of her business by creating more products to sell in the market but needs financial support to buy extra weaving materials. Erlinda is asking for a loan to buy buri (a kind of palm), rattan (vine like palm), bamboo and bolo.

She hopes to improve her business so that it will generate more income, and to boost her current project in the future.
